website_summaries.verdict: Overall offers a simple yet classy design in a variety of finishes. We love the fact that you can easily label the bins.
pros: Comes in your choice of copper, black, or pewter
Each bin has an area where you can affix a label
cons: Bin bottoms aren’t gridded like the fronts, so smaller objects can easily fall through them
Some buyers note that the rack arrives warped or missing mounting hardware

customer_reviews.title: Janky
customer_reviews.text: This came slightly bent so it would not sit straight on the wall. I spent 20+ minutes bending it back to sit right when hung. Also, the bottoms of the baskets are NOT grids, only one single wire from end to end, so you cannot store paperwork or notebooks in these-- they slide right out. They are not designed for papers!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great way to make order out of chaos - elegant metal storage
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these wall file holders to hang near our entrance/kitchen to help sort and collect mail and magazines. These have been a game-changer. They are elegant, very sturdy, and have a small footprint (i.e., they don't disrupt the flow down the hallway because they only come out a few inches.) They even came with hardware to screw them into the wall. I am thrilled with how they look and keep us organized and only wish I had done something like this sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Skye Schulte

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Organizer!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful mail/document organizer. It's just the right size-holds piles of mail and large Manila envelopes/folders. Came with hardware and was easy to hang-took about 5 minutes by myself. It even came with placards for labeling each bin! One of the bins was slightly bent, likely happened enroute, but I was able to fix it by bending it back with my hand. I love this so much, I may just buy more for the kids' rooms and mud room. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: It's beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Super pleased! Love the finish, looks very rustic, lightweight but very sturdy. Super easy to install. Mine did not come with screws but I honestly didn't read in the descriptions if it was supposed to. But no problem had some laying around. It's beautiful and I want to buy another just because it's so pretty but don't currently have a use for another. Great price, already assembled, fast shipping and packaged very well!
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Nice. Good size.
customer_reviews.text: K like this product for the most part. One thing is disappointing. The bottom of each shelf slot have wide bars instead of the wire square mesh its made from. So the corners for papers and mail slip and poke out the bottom. Which is not asthetically ideal. That being said, its well made and looks great. And i will probably buy another one eventually for my office area.
customer_reviews.author: amberw88

customer_reviews.title: ... file holders that when they came in I wouldn't like them, BUT they are amazing hanging up on ...
customer_reviews.text: I was unsure at first when I purchased these file holders that when they came in I wouldn't like them, BUT they are amazing hanging up on my wall. I used these to set up my Command Center in my kitchen and work great for holding our kid's school work. I'm usually very wary of buying stuff like this since metal stuff usually comes in bent but it's made of strong metal and was packaged great. I had no issues and fell in love with it once I had it up on my wall. If you're on the fence like I was, purchase these. You won't be sorry!
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Sharp wires that poke out in several places
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this but it has several wires that poke past where they should and are very sharp and unsafe. Luckily I noticed them before I hung it up. I bent them in or cut them off with wire cutters so it’s fine now but beware if you have little ones around! Check it over and make sure it’s safe before hanging it up!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny MacKenzie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for right by my entryway wall. Holds mail, planner and daycare receipts/papers
customer_reviews.author: S.Werthman

customer_reviews.title: Received defective item and wrong item
customer_reviews.text: These would be cute if I would have received the right/working items. I ordered 2 in black, but received 1 in black, 1 in pewter. Then, I was checking to see if a binder would fit in the top slot of the black one and it did, but when I placed it in there, it fell all the way through to the bottom. There was no bottom to the top file holder. Didn't break off or anything, just not there at all. The pewter one had a bottom at least. Very weird. Returning both.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Finally Paper Organized
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these. They fit work books and folders wonderfully for my boy. Each of my boys get one section of these and now I can keep all their bring home papers from school ( and let us be honest KIDS BRING REAMS OF PAPER HOME!!!! and I have 4) So this helps me keep everything all organized. I did think the metal seemed a bit pliable when I got them but in the months I have owned them they haven't broken or bent. I would assume if you are slamming stuff into it then yes they will bend but honestly unless you are tackling them or slamming them they will do the JOB!!
customer_reviews.author: Katrina K!

customer_reviews.title: Good to organize a command station!
customer_reviews.text: I believe this is going to work well to hold papers and clipboards for each child. I used the command strip clear hooks for hanging from the top and trimmed another command strip to support the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and durable, slots really difficult
customer_reviews.text: It's super cute and looks great with my "command center" However the little white cards to place in the slots came all wrinkled and bent and the bottom one took 10 minutes pry open the metal to make the piece go in. May try to use chalk or something else. (The tear at the bottom was from trying to make it go in, the other bends and wrinkles were how it came)
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: To small to get a hand in
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to have a place to sort and store mail. I guess it really is only for files, and not too many at once. It's pretty thin, very hard to get a hand in to get something from the bottom. It's sturdy enough but much slimmer than it looks in the photos.
customer_reviews.author: Molly Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful organizer. Would repurchase!
customer_reviews.text: I love this piece. It arrived on time and exactly as pictured. I love the dark pewter and distress on it. It looks like something you would see in decor in a magazine. It is as easy to hang on the wall as any other picture and can withstand a decent amount of weight even when hung on small nails. A good weight of metal - not flimsy. Perfect for a magazine holder in a living room, office, or even bathroom. Would definitely repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Knudson

customer_reviews.title: Great for organizing
customer_reviews.text: I got this to make it into add to my organization wall and love it. Easy to install
customer_reviews.author: Carmen

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed in this item. It was very cheap looking and not worth the price. I wanted to return it, but had to pay return shipping which was not expected. I sold at a rummage sale for much less that what I paid. At least I got some of my money back without have to pay more to return it. This also does not fit binders which I thought it did based on the measurements.
customer_reviews.author: A. Wondra

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice addition to my kitchen for those bills and kids school stuff. I have a farmers market style kitchen and fits in perfect. This is well made, sturdy and nice and solid material
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: MEASUREMENTS LISTED ARE NOT WHAT YOU GET
customer_reviews.text: The depth of the baskets is listed as 3 5/8" but the actual measurement is only about 3" at the top of the opening and only (barely) 2" at the bottom. The rack also seems to be bent, so it does not sit flush against the wall. The overall quality of the rack is much lower IRL than it seems in the pictures. If I had been planning on hanging it in a more visible spot, I'd be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Korn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for decluttering the counter
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to put mail and receipts in until they get filed. Much better than the kitchen counter, and it’s attractive too! Win!
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: I love the look of it so much that I ordered ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this so we can walk in the house and have somewhere to place the mail instead of laying it on the kitchen table. I love the look of it so much that I ordered a second one to hang next to it to have 4 slots. Very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Edmund

customer_reviews.title: Nice wall holder- missing an anchor
customer_reviews.text: I like the color and look of this wall holder. Ours came with only 1 wall anchor and no screws for hanging, which was disappointing. We made it work with some hardware we had. Looking forward to our mail/bills/etc. having a spot rather than sitting on our dining table!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I'm using one for my daughter's homework and the other will be for my son's when he starts school in August. It looks perfect in my kitchen! My only complaint is that it didn't come with mounting hardware and that the holes for the nails aren't level with each other.
customer_reviews.author: Emily in Colorado

customer_reviews.title: NIce for mail storage
customer_reviews.text: I use this for sorting mail/ills and filing. Was sick of it always piling up on the desk. It came with black screws and drywall anchors. I did end up using my own dry wall anchors. Easy to install and that was my first time using dry wall anchors even. (just watch a youtube tutorial) I like how it looks and have not had a problem with papers falling out the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary

customer_reviews.title: Rustic & cute command center must have
customer_reviews.text: Love this cute rustic mail holder. Gave me the cute command center I wanted. The only downfall for me is that it only had 2 screw holes for installation at the top of the baskets. I wish it had two on the bottom to make the install more sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for and a great price. Have these in my office and they are perfect for holding magazines, mail, folders and more. These are solid metal.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to keep my daughters' school papers in and I love it! All the papers fit nicely, the size of the pockets is really good and I like that there are little tabs included where I can write their names for the pockets. It was easy to install and overall a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: VeraC

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and Efficient!
customer_reviews.text: We use this to old our 2 laptops. It works great!! It is strong enough to hold them and is well manufactured.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten

customer_reviews.title: Funky and Cool
customer_reviews.text: Love this wall organizer. It adds style tonmy study and is roomy enough to fit a good amount of folders, papers, notebooks etc.. I'm going to buy a new one.
customer_reviews.author: J3nni3

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but missing hardware to install
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Easy to install, super cute in my office walls, and durable. I gave 4 stars due to the hardware missing from one of them. Probably wouldn’t be as annoyed by it if this were the first time I’ve ordered something in the last couple of weeks that has been missing the hardware or other pieces to the product from amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these (we ordered two). They keep my kids papers organized and off the counter.
customer_reviews.author: nicole

customer_reviews.title: Definite buy!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something a lot more attractive to hold the kids homework, binders etc for school other than those crappy 80's plastic file wall holders. This rack is perfect and fit's in nicely with our kitchen decor! My only complaint is that it could be slightly larger in the basket area, that being said though both are holding a binder, 1 music book, 2 thin text books, 1 file folder and a recorder and a few misc papers, so it does hold a lot I just wish it was a little roomier!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: Love this rack, looks great in my horse trailer. I buy it for a gift for my girls and girlfriends.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to place in our camper to hold magazines, manuals, and books. It is just what I wanted! Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Online_Shopper_Extraordinaire

customer_reviews.title: Great Wall Basket
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is some papers/mail kinda fall through the big holes in the bottom I had to cut some cardboard and stick so it would be even
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Nice touch
customer_reviews.text: Love them but baskets are just wide enough to wedge a regular size file folder in. Would love to have another for my cubical but not for the price
customer_reviews.author: Selena

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: I love this folder -used it for the communication center of my house fits file folders easy to install looks nice
customer_reviews.author: Lora

customer_reviews.title: Looks good on my wall and is sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This was a great addition to my home office. Very easy to install, looks good and is very sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Item returned
customer_reviews.text: I returned this item, it was too big for me.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce M Rubio

customer_reviews.title: Bent a little
customer_reviews.text: It was bent when it arrived. I think i can straighten it okay.
customer_reviews.author: Diane D.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for!!! Nice basement game room decoration and practical!
customer_reviews.author: Ben Prickel

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I just wish that the bottom of the bins had smaller openings.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie C

customer_reviews.title: Not what expected
customer_reviews.text: Front of pockets is very high, have to stand magazine tall ways.. would’ve preferred sideways. Couldn’t return maybe because of awkward size idk. Don’t like it but will deal
customer_reviews.author: MLA

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great on my wall and helps keep papers off my desk!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... the area I wanted it for perfectly and I love the color
customer_reviews.text: Fits the area I wanted it for perfectly and I love the color. Unfortunately when I received it one of the baskets was bent and I had to bend it back into place and I was disappointed about the packaging and care of the package. But, the product itself is just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Carole

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice look but would be nice if it came with the hardware to hang it. The pockets are a bit narrow I was hoping it would hold a file folder but too small.
customer_reviews.author: DeviantCat

customer_reviews.title: Practical and beautiful ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
customer_reviews.text: If you need organization, you can't go wrong with this product! It's sturdy and strong
customer_reviews.author: Heather Parsons

customer_reviews.title: Great Wall Organizer!
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this wall organizer. I ordered it in black. In addition, I added “S” hooks for hanging keys & other miscellaneous items. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Nickisher

customer_reviews.title: Easy to hang and easy to slip your own labels ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for my desk area. Easy to hang and easy to slip your own labels in. I used thin cardboard from inside a cereal box and labeled them for mail...incoming, outgoing, review & due, and recycle. They are perfect. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Jo Jo

customer_reviews.title: Very well made. Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very well made, good price, fast delivery, easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: These Wall organizers will come in hand for "online school". Look and feel great.
customer_reviews.author: The Renners

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I have this hanging in my kitchen and keep all of our loose mail/papers in it.
customer_reviews.author: AddyB

customer_reviews.title: too narrow to store files horizontally
customer_reviews.text: very slightly too narrow to fit a standard size file folder, when resting horizontally. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Kara F. Poorbaugh

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Sleek and stylish in my kitchen for my recipe books but also a minimalist look. Easy to put together and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great holder
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our wall to organize mail & papers for school. It's much bigger than I thought. It is distressed & comes with white cardboard labels.
customer_reviews.author: Beck

customer_reviews.title: Function and look
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and function. Bought this for mail organization and will most likely buy a second one. Like that there is only two screws needed.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my wall and does everything I hoped it would. Easy install.
customer_reviews.author: J-Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Great for organizing mail and papers!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to hang on my dining room wall to keep mail and kids papers off of the table. It works great and looks great in my rustic farmhouse. It holds regular size papers, kids books, magazines, mail, and newspapers (folded in half).
customer_reviews.author: ReadsPastHerBedtime

customer_reviews.title: perfect to use in a rustic lobby for magazines
customer_reviews.text: perfect to use in a rustic lobby for magazines. Light and sturdy enough to use 3M removable strips and still hold multiple magazines
customer_reviews.author: Heathers

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: Re did our pantry and am using this for plastic bags. Worked out perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Stewy2

customer_reviews.title: It is perfect for what I bought it for
customer_reviews.text: I hung these on my wall and use them to old my children's school papers. It is perfect for what I bought it for. I am very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: It'd be great if there was a way to secure the bottom of this organizer to give it a little more stability, but it is perfect for what we needed it for otherwise!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Albee

customer_reviews.title: The only thing I don't like is that the slot between the top and bottom ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly for mail storage in my house. The only thing I don't like is that the slot between the top and bottom file holders is small and it is sometimes hard to put things in the bottom holder.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Homework madness ended
customer_reviews.text: I got this to hang in my kitchen with a cork board, white board, and shelf for the kids bookbags. Love it! It holds all their homework assignments, and stray papers all in one place! No more papers strung throughout the house! very easy to install
customer_reviews.author: Mary Beth

customer_reviews.title: Exactly As Described
customer_reviews.text: This file holder is very durable and is exactly as described. The size is perfect and they are very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Cherity Kerns

customer_reviews.title: Organize kids
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly next to our kids messenger board. Perfect place to keep the kids school papers. Perfect way to organize the kids.
customer_reviews.author: CPhelps

customer_reviews.title: Not level
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking but I had to return it because the screw holes were not attached to the item in a level manner therefore I could not hang it level.
customer_reviews.author: AK2017

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: I needed something to sort the mail between my boyfriend and myself. This does the job. Got here fast and easy to install!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: and it looks amazing! We've had many compliments on the look
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a magazine rack for our office, and it looks amazing! We've had many compliments on the look, and it holds plenty of magazines.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Great design, good value
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install, aesthetically pleasing for home and workplace. Good deal, too. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie A Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: Have this in our guest bathroom for mag's. Fits the project perfectly! Capacity is somewhat limited but easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: SierraStyle

customer_reviews.title: poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Wire broke during initial install. Very poor quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cute, but wont hold file folders in the horizontal orientation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Classy  look
customer_reviews.text: I use these for holding my order forms. They beat using those ugly acrylic holders. Very classy.
customer_reviews.author: Richlon

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad purchase
customer_reviews.text: This organizer is average. It looks good and a good place for ziplock bags and a cookbook.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Literally a joke. Looks like it was colored with a metallic sharpie. Wish I could get a refund
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Downs

customer_reviews.title: Easy to hang too - though it does not come ...
customer_reviews.text: So cute! Easy to hang too - though it does not come with the screws or wall anchors needed to do so.
customer_reviews.author: Lane

customer_reviews.title: Easy to hang
customer_reviews.text: Very cute in my office space. Easy to hang, very functional and great looking!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poorly spaced bars in the bottom
customer_reviews.text: The slots in the bottom don't allow for my mail to be held properly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great producr
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter that is in college. Works great. Well made
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like it!
customer_reviews.text: Cute, rustic decor. Well made and at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Nicci

customer_reviews.title: Size
customer_reviews.text: It is not wide enough to easily fit a file folder.
customer_reviews.author: SFanelli

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Got them over 6 months ago and they are holding up very well.
customer_reviews.author: Derrick Smith

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a wall holder like this.
customer_reviews.author: mikki s.

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Love them. These hang in the mail center in my kitchen and look great.
customer_reviews.author: Kacie

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this so much
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this so much!! Looks so great in my kitchen! I use the top for my magazines and the bottom to hold my mail!! Looks so country in my kitchen!! Very CLASSY item!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The metal wall hanger was an excellent addition to the mailboxes my husband made for my classroom!
customer_reviews.author: Lokemele25

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Well made and alot of room. I attached this to a brick wall and it is the perfect file holder.
customer_reviews.author: William John Petures

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Look great on my wall...made a command center and this is perfect piece
customer_reviews.author: Heathaw418

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Large and sturdy. It holds large and small envelopes and it looks great in my office.
customer_reviews.author: Kristie Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Wall mounted file organizer
customer_reviews.text: Love this wall system! We hung it in our kitchen along with a chalkboard calendar and framed cork board. It's the perfect place for our daughters to put their weekly homework folders, reading logs to be signed, etc. It looks great too! It is deep enough to hold lots of papers, but doesn't stick out too far from the wall causing anyone to bump into it. The hanging hardware is sturdy. I really like this piece!
customer_reviews.author: M & L

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Addition to my Command Ctr!
customer_reviews.text: This rack was exactly what I needed to keep my children's school information in order. The rack is made of a strong durable metal and the design was simple, yet classy. The rack came with the required pieces for installation (screws etc..) and my husband hung it with in minutes. The front allows for you to insert a label, however, I opted to use photos instead. Thus far, I have used it to hold a normal sized manila envelope and plastic folders. I recommend the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: LNBone

customer_reviews.title: Purposeful and stylish for your office
customer_reviews.text: I needed a little storage for quick grab stuff next to my desk in my home office. This is the perfect size. It goes great with the theme of my room and doesn't look like those icky plastic ones that scream "office". It fits in nicely with my decor. Very sturdy. If I had to have a negative about it, I wish it was like 1/4 to 1/2 inch wider. A regular file folder just fits in the pocket and it catches whenever I try to pull it out. You can't just reach for it, you have to pull it straight up or it catches on the sides of a file folder, but it is what it is.....
customer_reviews.author: Lynda

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't Be Happier...
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't be happier with this terrific hanging basket for the office. It's up by the door. Everything I need to take with me for the day is put in the top slot the night before. In the bottom slot, I put important papers for appointments and work coming up during the week. This keeps a very organized rotating system going so that I'm always prepared with the materials I need. The slots are large and can hold more papers and items than I expected. All around this is a great product for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for to organize my mail and papers better. Good size and easy to hang. The metal is painted to look like pewter, it is not extremely realistic looking, but it looks great if you do not look right up close. But for the price, I wouldn't really expect it to be too realistic. It's a good price for the product. I love the design and style, and it works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Anne K Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great piece just pricey
customer_reviews.text: Looks exactly like the picture, was easy to assemble and is sturdy/does the job. My only complaint is the price. I do agree with some of the other reviewers, that you could probably get something similar at a TJ or Target for a fraction of the price. It is a very nice piece though and I have received several compliments, so if money isnt an ish, then buy away!
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: I love to be organized and this really helps our family. This is set up in our entry way and looks cute in the farmhouse style of our home. The pockets are big so that you can really fit a lot of papers in there.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Jaguar

customer_reviews.title: Looks and Function
customer_reviews.text: Needed additional storage near my desktop - this was perfect to place on side of bookcase/filing cabinet - works great and looks nice - husband had no trouble screwing it into side of wood book case
customer_reviews.author: vdolese

customer_reviews.title: Good but...
customer_reviews.text: The only two reasons I didn't leave a 5-star review are these: 1. The packaged hardware (mollies and screws) are ridiculously cheap and ineffective. I used my own and threw those away. 2. There's no mounting point at the bottom corners of the rack itself, just the top two corners. This causes it to be able to be lifted away from the wall from the bottom. Not a huge deal but I'd prefer it be 100% secure against the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, easy to put up
customer_reviews.text: I bought this along with a calendar to put in our kitchen. I use this to help sort my husband and I mail. It’s sturdy, was easy to put up and serves its purpose versus having a pile of mail on our kitchen counter.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi K

customer_reviews.title: Organize Mail
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my mail and file. It is big enough that it holds small or big mail. It also can hold a lot obviously from my picture I need to file lol
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Hollis

product_meta.title: Two Tier Wall File Holder – Durable Antique Copper Metal Rack with Spacious Slots for Easy Organization, Mounts on Wall and Door for Office, Home, and Work – by Designstyles
product_meta.description:
Color:Antique CopperGet work done without the stress of a cluttered mess! This Metal File Holder from Designstyles is the perfect solution for loose papers and a messy desktop.

Two compartments with slots for labels make it easy to store loose papers, documents, notebooks, bills, letter, folders, magazines, books, manuals and so much more! Hang it on an empty wall closest to your desk and have everything you need nearby. When you free up surface space in your office or home things run smoothly and you can focus on the task at hand.

PRODUCT FEATURES:

 2 Slots for Letters
26"H x 12"L x 4"W
Easily Mounts to Walls
Great For Organizing
Saves Spaces
Label Slots Make it Easy to See What you Need
Works in Office, Bedroom, Kitchen or Bathroom
Available in Pewter, Black, Antique Copper, Chrome, and Copper

MAKES ANY WALL FUNCTIONAL

This versatile wall organizer is great in just about any room! It’s especially great for small spaces and homes. It’s useful in the bedroom, kitchen, bathroom, laundry room, workshop or garage. Use it to store kitchen supplies like towels and cutting boards. Use it to store tools and supplies in your garage or shed. Free surface space in your home and utilize empty wall space. They’re already assembled and easy to install so you can start getting organized immediately. It’s especially great in offices and art studios.

ABOUT US

At Designstyles we believe organization and style should be effortless and affordable. So we work to provide a wide range of supplies and organizers that make life run smoothly. With everything from magazine racks to storage baskets, you can depend on our carefully crafted products to keep your home or office neat and clean. We’ve got everything you need to make things run smoothly in your home or office. Choose style and choose Designstyles!
feature_bullets: DOUBLE BASKET ORGANIZER: Clear your desk space from loose papers and unwanted clutter. Keep important files, documents and folders neat, organized and away from your tabletops with the help of this hanging wall mount.

EASY TO INSTALL: Mounting is quick and easy with no assembly required. It’s ready to install. Utilize empty wall space and hang it on the wall closest to your desk so that everything you need is just within arm’s reach.

LONG-LASTING & DURABLE: A premium quality metal makes it durable so it can hold as much as you need it too. Don’t worry about it breaking or falling because a strong material makes it virtually indestructible.

STYLISH DESIGN: A modern look adds a sleek minimalist appeal that fits perfectly in with any home or office décor. Instantly transform any boring or dull wall space by adding this functional double file organizer.

MULTIFUNCTIONAL: It’s the perfect way to keep everything in order. Store everything from papers, mail, magazines, books, supplies and so much more. Mount in any room of your home, workspace or office.
